summary: Over the six-hour window the site saw steady winds near 5.9 m/s with a single gust up to 13.9 m/s; power output stayed low and fairly stable (around 0.18 on average) with a small negative residual suggesting generation was slightly below expected. Rotor speed was stable while generator speed showed much higher variability, yaw was persistently offset by about 8°, temperatures were elevated but steady (~47.5°C), and no non-normal operational statuses were recorded.
